discourse_list.title: Long term value sustain and prevent farming dump like curve

content.content: To make long term value accrual , it’s must that , whales don’t farm all the tokens and dump on retail users in Centralised exchages. To prevent this 1- UNI liquidity pool with liquidty  rewards must be created with major rewards going to UNI pool 2- Small liquidity providers( say providing  liquidty below 1000usd) must be incentivised and a fix number of tokens kept for them , also it needs to mentioned that some mechanism to protect Sybil attack must be done to do this safely 3- partner with yearn and other good ecosystem  projects to to grow more utility 4- Make governance gasless and apply quadratic Voting to nullify whale attack Please if you like my idea , comment   hail Uniswap  and like and suggest improvements on above. Also any generous person put this proposal as I don’t know how to do it. Thanks , Hail Uniswap
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is explaining a proposal to prevent whales from farming all the tokens and dumping them on retail users in centralized exchanges. The proposal includes creating a UNI liquidity pool with rewards, incentivizing small liquidity providers, partnering with other ecosystem projects, and making governance gasless. The author is asking for feedback and suggestions for improvement. A third party is extending to the proposal, giving constructive criticism, and asking questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: i think proposal nr 2 is difficult to implement. How would you prevent whales from just dividing their capital into small pieces to collect the incentive?
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Thanks for the knowledge really gained a lot
